comments:
I've got xdoclet 1.2.2 installed and, when going through the preferences, the
j2ee annotation provider definition for xdoclet appears to be just fine (no
warnings/errors within the preference pane).

However, when I then try to add a new "Enterprise JavaBean" through the wizard,
the window reports that the "Annotation provider definition not valid" but does
not indicate why it is invalid here yet fine in the preferences pane.

Also as a minor interface defect, if I switch the type to MDB then back to
session bean, the message dissapears.

At no time does the next/finish buttons become enabled.

Clearly if there is something wrong with the environment then I should be able
to identify what that is to fix it, but at this point I'm clueless.

This is the only information in the error log:
